data.question: What is the chemical formula for the ligand 2,3,7,8,12,13-hexahydroxytetraazanaphthotetraphene?
What is the preferred coordination geometry for Cu2+ and Ni2+ in the synthesis of MmHHTTn MOFs?
What technique was used to collect synchrotron single-crystal X-ray diffraction data for the MOFs?
What is the interlayer spacing observed in Cu3HHTT2?
What is the effect of axially coordinated water molecules in the structure of M6HHTT3 MOFs?
data.answer: They disrupt the π-stacking observed in Cu3HHTT2, increase the interlayer spacing, and cause slippage of the 2D honeycomb M3HHTT2 sheets into a staggered ABC packing motif.

data.question: Is the in-plane conductivity of Cu3HHTT2 higher or lower than its out-of-plane conductivity?
What is the approximate size of the hexagonal rods of Co6HHTT3?
data.answer: 20 µm in diameter and 200 µm in length

data.question: True or False: The dense staggered phase M6HHTT3 (M = Co2+, Mg2+, Ni2+) has relatively narrow bands at the Fermi level.
True or False: The in-plane conductivity of Ni3HHTT2 is approximately 10 times more conductive than Ni6HHTT3.
What is the role of DMF in the synthesis of Ni3HHTT2?
data.answer: DMF is more effective in disrupting the strong π-stacking between the sheets than water, leading to the formation of Ni3HHTT2.

data.question: True or False: The crystals of Cu3HHTT2 exhibit long-range order across the whole crystallite and along all three crystallographic directions.
What is the BET surface area of Cu3HHTT2?
True or False: The eclipsed phase M3HHTT2 (M = Cu2+, Ni2+) has widely dispersed bands consisting of orbitals from both metal ions and ligands at the Fermi level.
What is the effect of the ligand HHTT on the crystal growth of 2D MOFs?
data.answer: The HHTT ligand promotes a higher degree of both in-plane and out-of-plane crystallinity due to its large, electron-deficient core and enhanced π-stacking interactions.

data.question: True or False: The dense phase M6HHTT3 MOFs contain well-defined Co3(HHTT)(H2O)12 clusters centred in the hexagonal pockets defined by the 2D sheets.
What is the pKa1 value of HHTT as predicted by calculations?
True or False: The HRTEM data for Co6HHTT3 reveal alternating high- and low-contrast fringes spaced at 1.05 nm.
What is the role of the metal ion in defining the stacking sequence in 2D conductive MOFs?
data.answer: The identity of the metal ion is an important variable in defining the stacking sequence in 2D conductive MOFs, influencing whether the structure will have eclipsed or staggered packing.

data.question: True or False: The in-plane conductivity of ~100 S m−1 observed for Cu3HHTT2 is among the highest reported for any MOF.
What is the main conclusion regarding the relationship between structure and transport properties in 2D conductive MOFs?
data.answer: The study establishes clear correlations between structure and transport properties in 2D conductive MOFs, highlighting the influence of π-conjugation, packing motif, and metal ions on electrical conduction.
